definition: A system of symbols and characters used for written communication, typically consisting of letters, numbers, and punctuation marks. It is commonly employed for various purposes, including writing, printing, and typing.

examples.english: The writing on the sign was barely legible.

examples.english: She has a very beautiful handwriting.
